subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees traded Javier Vazquez to Arizona after the 2004 season but he remained high on their list before they reacquired him in a deal that sent Melky Cabrera to Atlanta.
snippet: The Yankees traded Javier Vazquez to Arizona after the 2004 season but he remained high on their list before they reacquired him in a deal that sent Melky Cabrera to Atlanta.
